tool_description: Api dinamica para una pagina de nba
name: nba-all-in-api-jsdw
title: nba-all-in-api-jsdw

api_list.name: Nba standings
api_list.description: this endpoint will return the actual position off all the nba teams
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nba-all-in-api-jsdw.p.rapidapi.com/Posiciones-API"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nba-all-in-api-jsdw.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
